content:
# elizaos/docs Daily Update (Jan 6, 2026)
## OVERVIEW 
The day saw the creation of a new issue focused on enhancing documentation for configuring agent memory, specifically addressing "knowledge" and "lore" sections.

## KEY TECHNICAL DEVELOPMENTS
No new technical developments were reported for this day.

## NEWLY OPENED PULL REQUESTS
No new pull requests were opened today.

## CLOSED ISSUES
No issues were closed today.

## NEW ISSUES
### Documentation for Agent Memory Configuration
- A new issue was opened to add a guide for configuring agent memory, specifically focusing on the "knowledge" and "lore" sections within the agent JSON [#82](https://github.com/elizaos/docs/issues/82). This addresses user struggles with agent memory/recall configuration, identified from a Discord discussion.

## ACTIVE ISSUES
No active issues with more than 3 comments were reported for this day.
